```{r libraries}
library(tidyverse)
library(here)
library(ggthemes)

theme_set(theme_few(base_size = 12))

```

```{r sachs, warning = FALSE}
braunwald_utts <- read_csv(here("braunwald_utterance_data.csv")) %>%
  mutate(error = as.logical(error),
         response_time = as.numeric(response_time))

child_data <- braunwald_utts %>%
  filter(speaker == "CHI" & responder != "CHI")
child_data
```

```{r response-times}
ggplot(child_data, aes(x = response_time, color = error)) + xlim(-2,10) +
  geom_density()
```
